mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_NAME , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.SALE_PRICE FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY MP.MENU_NO ORDER BY MP.MENU_SEQ DESC, M.MENU_NO ASC) AS RN , M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_NAME , M.CATEGORY_NO , MP.SALE_PRICE FROM TMENU M , TCATEGORY C , TMENUPRICE MP WHERE M.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND M.MENU_NO = MP.MENU_NO AND M.SALE_STATUS_NO = 'SS001' AND C.CATEGORY_NO = (SELECT C1.CATEGORY_NO FROM TCATEGORY C1 WHERE C1.USE_YN = '1' ORDER BY C1.PRIORITY ASC LIMIT 1) AND C.USE_YN = '1') A WHERE RN = 1

SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_NAME , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.SALE_PRICE FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY MP.MENU_NO ORDER BY MP.MENU_SEQ DESC, M.MENU_NO ASC) AS RN , M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_NAME , M.CATEGORY_NO , MP.SALE_PRICE FROM TMENU M , TCATEGORY C , TMENUPRICE MP WHERE M.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND M.MENU_NO = MP.MENU_NO AND M.SALE_STATUS_NO = 'SS001' AND C.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND C.USE_YN = '1') A WHERE RN = 1

SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_NAME , A.SALE_STATUS , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.SALE_PRICE FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY MP.MENU_NO ORDER BY MP.MENU_SEQ DESC, M.MENU_NO ASC) AS RN , M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_NAME , SS.SALE_STATUS , C.CATEGORY_NAME , MP.SALE_PRICE FROM TMENU M , TCATEGORY C , TMENUPRICE MP , TSALESTATUS SS WHERE M.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND M.MENU_NO = MP.MENU_NO AND M.SALE_STATUS_NO = SS.SALE_STATUS_NO AND C.USE_YN = '1') A WHERE RN = 1
